name: Tilray, Inc.
description: Tilray, Inc. is a global leader in the cannabis industry, focused on producing and distributing high-quality cannabis products for both medical and recreational use. Founded in 2013 and headquartered in Nanaimo, British Columbia, Tilray has established itself as a pioneer in cannabis research, cultivation, and distribution. The company operates in several key markets, including Canada, the United States, Europe, and Latin America, and offers a wide range of products including dried flower, oils, edibles, and beverages. Tilray is committed to advancing cannabis science and education, investing in research initiatives to explore the therapeutic benefits of cannabis and its potential applications in healthcare. With a robust supply chain and state-of-the-art facilities, Tilray is well-positioned to meet the growing demand for cannabis products as legalization expands globally. The company’s mission is to improve the quality of life for patients and consumers by providing innovative and accessible cannabis solutions, while also advocating for sensible cannabis policies worldwide.
